body:
Comment 1: 
The errors are being reported on different lines.  I don't really see how the compiler
can do better here.  When the compiler sees the method Foo, it ignores it with an error
message on line 17.  When the compiler sees the attempt to use F as a Fooer, it gives
two errors on line 10, but accurate since the method Foo was ignored.  The order of the
lines determines the order in which the error messages are reported.
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
